{{Infobox dungeon |name = Viridian Forest |image = [[File:Viridian Forest.png]] |caption = An overhead map of Viridian Forest. |tokens = 50 |location = North of Viridian City, on Route 2 }} '''Viridian Forest''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health (Pokémon) !! Base Health (Boss) !! Egg Steps Given |- | General || 102 || 510 || 5 |}

* Caterpie * Metapod * Weedle * Kakuna * Pidgey * Pidgeotto * Pikachu (boss)
